page.title: 15Religion- Rode and Southwick
page.content: The parishes of Southwick and Rode have C of E and Non-Conformist churches. St.Thomas's, Southwick is part of a 3 church parish. St.Lawrence and Christchurch, Rode and All Saints, Tellisford belong to a 5 church parish. A Family Communion and Sunday School is held every Sunday at St. Thomas's, with monthly Evensong and Holy Communion twice monthly. The Rode and Tellisford churches alternate 8 and 10.30 Communion and 6.30 evensong. There is no Sunday School but the children receive religious instruction after school on Wednesdays during termtime. Regular services are held at Rode Free Church, the Baptist Chapel and Southwick Provident Chapel. Rode has a Christian Fellowship, which meets weekly. Southwick is in the Diocese of Salisbury and Rode Major is in the Diocese of Bath and Wells.
